title: Molecular dynamics study of mechanical stability of Ti<sub>4</sub>C<sub>3</sub> MXene subjected to chirality, temperature, strain rate, and point-vacancy for Lithium-ion batteries

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19
